title: $:/plugins/kookma/pinboard
author: Mohammad Rahmani
name: Pinboard
description: Create a board to pin messages and pictures
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/kookma/TW-Pinboard">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/kookma/TW-Pinboard"/></$button>

; Pinboard
Pinboard creates a bulletin board (pinboard, pin board, noticeboard, or notice board in British English) which is a surface intended for the posting of public messages, for example, to announce events, or provide information.

;Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Pinboard/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Pinboard
